answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the collection of data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that data is collected automatically, and users are asked to provide personally identifiable information.

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects data such as Your Device's Internet Protocol address, browser type, browser version, the pages visited, the time and date of visits, time spent on pages, unique device identifiers, mobile device type, mobile device unique ID, mobile device IP address, mobile operating system, mobile Internet browser type, and other diagnostic data.

reply.analysis: The identified data types are explicitly mentioned as part of the information collected by the app in the privacy policy document.
reply.reference: The app collects data such as Your Device's Internet Protocol address, browser type, browser version, the pages visited, the time and date of visits, time spent on pages, unique device identifiers, mobile device type, mobile device unique ID, mobile device IP address, mobile operating system, mobile Internet browser type, and other diagnostic data. URL: https://www.privacypolicies.com/live/6c817f22-a990-47e2-a5ee-af0a0a7a664f

reply.question: 3. Does the app declare the purpose of data collection and use?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the purpose of data collection and use, which includes providing and maintaining the service, managing user accounts, contacting users, providing news and information, managing user requests, business transfers, data analysis, and improving the service and user experience.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly outlines the various purposes for which user data is collected and used, indicating a transparent declaration of data collection and use purposes.
reply.reference: To provide and maintain our Service, including to monitor the usage of our Service. To manage Your Account: to manage Your registration as a user of the Service. reply.question: 6. If the app shares data with third parties, what third parties does the app share data with?

answer.full_answer: Third parties providing news, special offers, and information about goods, services, and events similar to those the user has interacted with are the recipients of shared data.

content: Providers of news, special offers, and general information about similar goods, services, and events

reply.analysis: The privacy policy specifies that the app may share personal information with third parties for providing news, special offers, and general information about goods, services, and events similar to those the user has interacted with. This indicates a specific subset of third parties the app shares data with.
reply.reference: To provide You with news, special offers and general information about other goods, services and events which we offer that are similar to those that you have already purchased or enquired about unless You have opted not to receive such information. URL: https://www.privacypolicies.com/live/6c817f22-a990-47e2-a5ee-af0a0a7a664f
